cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Financial Services on June 22, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7977, Promoting Opportunities for Non-Traditional Capital Formation Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 98 (Wednesday, June 8, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. WATERS:
H.R. 7977.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with the
power to ``regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H5409]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 29 - 24.

title: Promoting Opportunities for Non-Traditional Capital Formation Act
